system.description:
This spell creates an invisible magical barrier around the caster, forming a protective shell that completely blocks all magic.

Effects:

  • The barrier surrounds the caster’s body at a distance of less than an inch.
  • It prevents all magic from passing through, including the caster's own spells.
  • The caster may end the effect at will before the duration expires.
  • The barrier lasts for 12 turns unless dismissed.
  • No form of magic (except for a wish) can cancel or dispel the shell—not even dispel magic.
